text: The Curtis R. Priem Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center (EMPAC) is a big concert hall and place for arts at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, New York. It opened on October 3, 2008. It has a lot of high tech things in it. ==Other websites== *EMPAC Main Page Category:Concert halls in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in New York (state)
title: EMPAC
